timeline.message: feature -- add BlockArea Type Handler for serilization

timeline.bodyText: So - was this actually never working? 🙄
timeline.author: skaldarnar

timeline.bodyText:
As you are using 'setSize(...)` you don't need to do any computation here:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                                new BlockArea(
          
          
            
                                    minArr.get(0), minArr.get(1)).setSize(
          
          
            
                                    minArr.get(0) + sizeArr.get(0),
          
          
            
                                    minArr.get(1) + sizeArr.get(1)));
          
          
            
                                new BlockArea(minArr.get(0), minArr.get(1))
          
          
            
                                		.setSize(sizeArr.get(0), sizeArr.get(1)));
timeline.author: skaldarnar

timeline.bodyText:
Same here:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                                new BlockArea(
          
          
            
                                    minArr.get(0), minArr.get(1)).setSize(
          
          
            
                                    minArr.get(0) + sizeArr.get(0),
          
          
            
                                    minArr.get(1) + sizeArr.get(1)));
          
          
            
                                new BlockArea(minArr.get(0), minArr.get(1))
          
          
            
                                		.setSize(sizeArr.get(0), sizeArr.get(1)));
timeline.author: skaldarnar
